remarks: An injection is compatible with any operations on the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.)
statement:
f1ocpbl.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -1-1-onto-> X ) $.
f1ovscpbl $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( ( F ` B ) = ( F ` C ) -> ( F ` ( A .+ B ) ) = ( F ` ( A .+ C ) ) ) ) $.
